price: 27.Nabii Suleymaan Hud-Huduk, numma taceem kee hinnay dirableelak numuk teyna kinnitom kok wagtennooh cubbusenno kaak iyye.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
